00055 #ifndef INDRI_NETWORKLISTENER_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_NETWORKLISTENER_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "lemur/lemur-compat.hpp"
00059 #include "indri/NetworkStream.hpp"
00060 
00061 class NetworkListener {
00062   socket_t _socket;
00063 
00064 public:
00065   NetworkListener() : _socket(-1) {}
00066   ~NetworkListener() {
00067     close();
00068   }
00069 
00070   bool listen( unsigned int port ) {
00071     lemur_compat::initializeNetwork();
00072     _socket = ::socket( AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0 );
00073 
00074     sockaddr_in sa;
00075     sa.sin_addr.s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
00076     sa.sin_port = htons(port);
00077     sa.sin_family = AF_INET;
00078     memset( &sa.sin_zero, 0, sizeof sa.sin_zero );
00079 
00080     ::bind( _socket, (const sockaddr*) &sa, sizeof sa );
00081     int result = ::listen( _socket, 8 );
00082 
00083     if( result ) {
00084       close();
00085       return false;
00086     }
00087 
00088     return true;
00089   }
00090 
00091   NetworkStream* accept() {
00092     assert( _socket != -1 );
00093     socket_t s = ::accept( _socket, 0, 0 );
00094     return new NetworkStream(s);
00095   }
00096 
00097   void close() {
00098     lemur_compat::closesocket(_socket);
00099     _socket = -1;
00100   }
00101 };
00102 
00103 #endif // INDRI_NETWORKLISTENER_HPP
